title: ShoutStart
description: A PR-publishing platform that guides users through writing, submitting, publishing, and amplifying press releases and articles across high-authority channels.
challenge: Creating a multi-step ‘How it works’ flow with branded illustration assets and a metrics dashboard, while ensuring fast load times and mobile-first responsiveness.
solution: Built a Next.js single-page app leveraging optimized image components, CSS-grid layouts for steps, and reusable React testimonial cards for rapid content updates.
